    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(HostDetails hd)
        Connect to the host specified by the provided HostDetails. Only attempt connection if the remote host has lower host ID than local - this is required to avoid bidirectional connection establishment
        Parameters:
        hd - remote host details

      • accept

      • pauserSupplier

        @NotNull
public C pauserSupplier(@NotNull
                                 @NotNull Supplier<net.openhft.chronicle.threads.Pauser> pauserSupplier)
        Sets the Pauser Supplier to the provided pauserSupplier. If the user does not supply an eventLoop() then the pauserSupplier is used when lazily creating the EventGroup.
        Parameters:
        pauserSupplier - to be used by the event loop
        Returns:
        this ClusterContext
